EasyMareyMap 0.2.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • How to estimate local recombination rates with the Marey map method

    Reference

    All functions

    bootstrap_marey_map()

    Bootstrap the Marey map

    bootstrap_rec_map()

    Bootstrap the recombination map

    brokenstick()

    Plot the broken stick

    brokenstick_one_map()

    Compute the broken stick model for a single Marey map

    calibrate_smoothing()

    Automatic calibration of the smoothing parameter

    coefficient_variation()

    Calculate the variance and coefficient of variation of recombination rates

    comparative_interpolation_to_dataframe()

    Convert Marey interpolated functions in a `comparative_marey_map` objects to `data.frame`

    comparative_marey_map()

    A meta Marey map object for comparative analyses

    comparative_marey_to_dataframe()

    Convert Marey maps in a `comparative_marey_map` objects to `data.frame`

    comparative_recmap_to_dataframe()

    Convert recombination maps in a `comparative_marey_map` objects to `data.frame`

    comparative_recombination_maps()

    Estimate recombination maps in meta Marey map object

    compute_stats_marey()

    Compute summary statistics on a meta `comparative_marey_map` object

    cv_resampling()

    K-fold systematic cross-validation of the smoothing parameter

    fit_loess()

    Fit a LOESS function to the Marey map

    fit_spline()

    Fit a smoothing spline function to the Marey map

    flip()

    Flip genetic positions

    flip.interval()

    Flip genetic positions in interval

    flip.selection()

    Flip genetic positions with visual selection of markers

    get_marey_map()

    Get the Marey map of a `marey_map` object

    gini()

    Calculate the Gini index of a recombination map

    lorenz()

    Plot the Lorenz curve

    marey_map()

    Instantiate a `marey_map` object

    mask.marker()

    Mask markers in interval/position

    mean(<marey_map>)

    Mean of recombination rates

    median(<marey_map>)

    Median of recombination rates

    merge_comparative_marey()

    Merge `comparative_marey_map` objects

    outlier_selection()

    Remove outlying markers by visual zone selection on the Marey map

    peripherybias()

    Calculate the periphery-bias ratio as in Brazier and Glémin (2022)

    plot(<marey_map>)

    Plot the Marey maps

    plot_comparative_marey()

    Plot comparative Marey maps

    plot_comparative_recmap()

    Plot comparative recombination maps

    plot_recombination_map()

    Plot the recombination map

    predict_genetic_map()

    Interpolate new genetic positions

    recombination_map()

    Global function estimate the recombination map

    subset_comparative_marey()

    Subset a `comparative_marey_map` object

    summary(<comparative_marey_map>)

    Summary of a `comparative_marey_map` object

    summary(<marey_map>)

    Summary of a `marey_map` object

    unmask.marker()

    Un-Mask markers in interval/position

    variance()

    Variance of recombination rates

    veller()

    Calculate the r-bar statistic from Veller et al. (2019) r-bar estimate the intra-chromosomal shuffling

    vld.marker()

    Change the state 'vld' of markers in interval/position

    weighted.mean(<marey_map>)

    Weighted Mean of recombination rates

    windows_physical_map()

    Aggregate recombination rates in sliding windows along the genome
